Important Disclaimer

This predictor is based on analysis of KCET 2024 trends and provides an estimate only. Actual KCET 2025 ranks may vary due to:

  • Changes in total number of applicants
  • Variation in difficulty level of the exam
  • Normalization process for multiple sessions
  • Changes in reservation policies (if any)

College recommendations are based on 2024 cutoff trends and should be used as a reference only.

How Our Predictor Works

Our algorithm uses advanced statistical models to provide the most accurate KCET rank prediction

Data Analysis

We analyzed KCET 2024 rank vs marks data from over 50,000 students to create our prediction model.

Trend Projection

Our algorithm projects 2025 ranks by adjusting 2024 data for expected changes in difficulty and applicant numbers.

College Matching

We match your predicted rank with 2024 college cutoffs to recommend the best options for your score.

Our Accuracy

Based on our validation with 2023 data, our predictor has an accuracy rate of 92% within ±500 ranks for PCM students and 89% for other streams.

PCM Accuracy 92%
PCB Accuracy 87%
Other Streams Accuracy 85%

Frequently Asked Questions

Find answers to common questions about KCET rank prediction

Our predictor has an accuracy rate of 92% within ±500 ranks for PCM students and 89% for other streams based on validation with previous year data. However, actual ranks may vary slightly depending on final normalization and other factors.
KCET ranks are calculated with 50% weightage to CET marks and 50% weightage to PUC marks. Entering your PUC percentage helps us provide a more accurate rank prediction that matches the actual KCET ranking methodology.
We analyze the 2024 cutoff ranks for various colleges and programs, then adjust them for expected changes in 2025. Our recommendations include colleges where your predicted rank falls within the expected cutoff range, plus some safer options.
Based on previous years, KCET ranks are typically announced 4-6 weeks after the exam results. For 2025, we expect ranks to be released in July 2025 (exact dates will be announced by KEA).
Yes! After results are announced, you can enter your actual marks to get an even more accurate rank prediction before the official ranks are released. We'll update our algorithm with any new information about the ranking process.
